document.docAuthor: Bakker, Piet A. J. & Albano, Paolo G.
document.masterDocTitle: Nomenclator, geographic and stratigraphic distribution of the family Triphoridae (Mollusca: Gastropoda)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Nomenclator, geographic and stratigraphic distribution of the family Triphoridae (Mollusca: Gastropoda)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Triforis concors Hinds, 1843
—
Tryon 1887: 178
, pl. 37, fig. 80.

Triphora ( Triphora ) concors Hinds, 1843
—
Kosuge 1961a: 314
, pl. 19, fig. 8.

Iniforis concors (Hinds, 1843)
—
Habe & Kosuge 1966: 109
, pl. 41, fig. 47.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality.
Straits of Malacca , in 18 fathoms deep (
33 m
)
.

Type material.
NHMUK 1844.6.7.27/1, lectotype . NHMUK 1844.6.7.27/2 and
NHMUK 1879.2.26.200/1, paralectotypes
.

Remarks. Lectotype designation by
Albano et al. (2019)
. Kay (1979) considered
Triphoris fucata Pease, 1861 a
junior synonym of
T. concors
. Similarly, Kosuge (1981) considered
Triphoris nodifera A. Adams & Reeve, 1850
,
Triphora fuscoapicata G.B. Sowerby III, 1907
and
Torresophora elongata Laseron 1958
junior synonyms of
T. concors
.
